ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this promise come about if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Instead they say: "When is this promise going to be, if you speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask you: “When will this promise (of Resurrection) be fulfilled, if what you say is true?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "When will the Day of Judgment be if what you say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise come, if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When is this promise if you are truthful"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this promise be (fulfilled) if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When is this promise (to be fulfilled) if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when is this promise to be fulfilled if ye say sooth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "When will this promise (come to pass) if ye are telling the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "When is this promise (i.e. the Day of Resurrection will be fulfilled) if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They ask: 'When, if what you say is true, will this promise come'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When is this promise due, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:29] And they say, ‘When shall this promise, of chastisement, be [fulfilled], if you are being truthful?’, concerning it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they) the disbelievers of Mecca (say: When is this promise) Muhammad ((to be fulfilled) if ye are 486 truthful) if you are truthful that we will be raised after we die?
